testsuite.name: oradb::installdb CentOS unpacked oradb utils structure

testcase.name: oradb::installdb CentOS unpacked oradb utils structure should contain Db_directory_structure[oracle structure 11.2.0.3_11.2.0.3_Linux-x86-64] with ensure => "present", oracle_base_dir => "/u01/app/oracle", ora_inventory_dir => "/u01/app/oraInventory", os_user => "oracle", os_group => "oinstall" and download_dir => "/mnt"
